cities.name: Montreal
cities.description: Born and raised Montrealer who has been dissapointed 21 years in a row by the Montreal Canadiens!

cities.name: Annecy
cities.description: One of my favorite cities in the world, been lucky enough to have been twice in my life!!! The city know for making me discovered the amazing tarttiflette and where Franco order a tub of 9 ice cream... Check Video Of The Experience

cities.name: Aix Les Bains
cities.description: Weekend trip where we climbed up le Mont Revard, which has an elevation of 1,538 m. It took us over 4 hours to climb.Check Video Of The Experience

cities.name: Alpe D'Huez
cities.description: Day trip where we went skiing on top of Alpe D'Huez, a moutain in the middle of the Alpes. The day where me and Niv had to spring after a bus carrying our equipement because the metro wasn't working :(. I also fell down a mountain.... Check Video Of The Experience

cities.name: Cannes
cities.description: The city where we saw an entire fleet of old military vehicles pass by and which lead us to be stuck in traffic.

cities.name: Chamonix
cities.description: The city of France that shares the largest mountain in the Alpes, Mont Blanc, with Italy and Switzerland. Instead of going up the moutain, we went up the mountain facing it that happened to be a zoo!

cities.name: Disney Paris
cities.description: Adding to our disney collection, our family decided to go to one of the most magical places on earth!!! Believe it or not, but Mickey was still speaking in English!

cities.name: Grenoble
cities.description: Amazing weekend trip with my mom and sister where we went to Grenoble to hike up the moutain and travel in their famous Gondalas!!!

cities.name: Lyon
cities.description: My second home!!! The city where I spent the best 6 months of my life living in an apartment with my best friend, traveling the world, dancing on tables in a club, biking home at 3am right after eating a taco Lyonnaise and living life to the fullest.

cities.name: Marseille
cities.description: The city where we had some of the best pizza and nuts!! Where we also made the stupid idea of taking the non tvg train...

cities.name: Château de Pierrefonds
cities.description: The castle where the BBC show Merlin was located. We went to fulfill Vanessa's dream of visiting it!! I remeber there was an amazing bakery at the bottom with an amazing quiche!!!

cities.name: Normandy
cities.description: Visiting where the allies stormed to take France back from the axis forces. Got to visit the Canadian WWII museum and Juno beach.

cities.name: Château de Versailles
cities.description: The only place on earth with gold every where

cities.name: Paris
cities.description: In my opion one of the most overrated cities in the world, but still wonderful! It does have aligot and the eiffle tower working in its favour though!

cities.name: Barbados
cities.description: Family vacation with family and grandparents!!!

cities.name: Copenhagen
cities.description: Weekend trip where me, my mom and my sister took the opportunity of a lifetime to visit the wonderful city of Denmark. My sister finally learnt how to jump onto a round boulder and my mom almost, but didn't, get 47k steps in a day.

cities.name: Berlin
cities.description: The best march break of my life, got to spend 5 days in the beautiful city of Berlin full of history. During my time there got to try currywurst, go up the wonderful tv tower and take a walking tour to live through the amazing history of the city. Check Video Of The Experience

cities.name: Guadeloupe
cities.description: Vacation with my grandparents again where we rented a beautiful house and ate way too many Bokits sandwhiches!!!

cities.name: Benevento
cities.description: Day trip with my aunt before returning home to Lyon

cities.name: Naples
cities.description: Day trip to Naples where my cousin showed me around the beautiful city and where I got to eat what some claim to be the best pizza in the world. Also shout out to Luca for making me try to talk a straight line blind folded to only epically fail in front of random people and almost hit a car!!!

cities.name: Guardia Sanframondi
cities.description: The city where my amazing family in Italy lives!!! I have been so lucky to have been able to visit the city and my family 3 times in my life and I hope to be able to go many more times!!!

cities.name: Aushwitz
cities.description: Eye opening experience that I suggest everyone should witness once in there life!

cities.name: Katowice
cities.description: End of my spring break travel week where I got to visit the great city of Katowice. Yes the main reason I went there was to be dissapointed by Team Liquid loosing to Ence at the CSGO Major :(

cities.name: Geneva
cities.description: The first weekend I spent with my mom and sister when they came to visit me. Shout out to Cherry the cow, who like the cherry season, was short lived! The best fondu in the world and also way too much chocolate at the Caillers factory! Check Video Of The Experience

cities.name: New York
cities.description: Been a couple of times, most recently for a school trip in sec 5 with some of my closest friends at Royal West.

cities.name: Acadie
cities.description: Day visit after having stayed in PEI for a week! Honestly to this day I am still trying to understand what they were saying and why someone would create a poutine rape....

cities.name: Bahamas
cities.description: Family vacation where we caught fish with a string, hook and bananas!!!

cities.name: Banff
cities.description: To be fair this was a long time ago so I don't remeber too much...

cities.name: Barcelona
cities.description: Bye bye Nexus 6p :( that I lost on the metro by getting pick pocketted... But thank god they had 1$ sangria that was able to still make the city very enjoyable! Although the Picaso museum was very dissapointing and to this day we still don't know if it was a cat or mouse in the artwork.

cities.name: Belize
cities.description: To this day all I remeber is the rice and beans as well as lifting our asses so we don't get attacked by leaches!!!

cities.name: Bermuda
cities.description: An amazing cruise experience where we visited the different parts of bermuda and all got sick from the chocolate buffet!!

cities.name: Budapest
cities.description: Stop number 2 on the cousins trip!!! Got to have some amazing food in a little market, relax in an amazing and famous spa and party until the end of night on a boat where me and Gabby did a shoey!!!!!!

cities.name: Calgary
cities.description: City stop during a roadtrip in an RV with my family accross western Canada!

cities.name: Chicago
cities.description: City stop during a family road trip around the great lakes! I will never forget the deep dish pizza!

cities.name: Columbia Ice Field
cities.description: City stop during a roadtrip in an RV with my family accross western Canada! I remeber getting to drink the water straight from glacier stream!!!

cities.name: Cuba
cities.description: Trip to cuba where we met the infamous Guido the Iguana!

cities.name: Detroit
cities.description: City stop during a family road trip around the great lakes! Never forget going to see a game where we were told the ball always goes.... then to realize we were way up top!

cities.name: Disney California
cities.description: The second time our family has been to Disney where we fell in love with the turkey legs as well as the craze ferris wheel!

cities.name: Edmonton
cities.description: City stop during a roadtrip in an RV with my family accross western Canada! Lowkey don't understand who came up with the idea for that mall!!!

cities.name: Hollywood
cities.description: The sign is actually copyrighted but lets just hope to god they don't come after me for the picture!!!

cities.name: Jasper
cities.description: Everytime I see the picture I just want to jimp into the water!!!

cities.name: Magog
cities.description: Weekend trip visiting the beautiful small city as well as the Orford national park!

cities.name: Milan
cities.description: Day stop with my family in the beautiful city of Milan where we got to meet my dad's cousin and his family!

cities.name: Myrtle Beach
cities.description: I was so young all I rememeber is the food and show experience!!! The medival castle I think.

cities.name: New Brunswick
cities.description: I don't know exactly where we were, but we stop in the province on our way back home from PEI and celebrated my grandparents anniversary!

cities.name: Palm Springs
cities.description: I will never forget getting lost on a trail in the dessert!!! Honestly was the funniest thing to come out of the entire trip to California!

cities.name: Prince Edwards Island
cities.description: Summer trip to a cabine with my moms entire family! The most memorable part is the fact we went deep sea fishing and didn't catch a single fish... Then had to turn back early because a storm was brewing!

cities.name: Pisa
cities.description: Yes I did take pictures of me holding up the tower, no you cannot see these pictures!!!

cities.name: Rome
cities.description: Another location I have been twice in my life, a place full of history that still I can go back and will have so much left to go visit!

cities.name: San Diego
cities.description: Honestly I just remeber the Zoo from the city.... Give me a break it was a long time ago!!!!

cities.name: San Francisco
cities.description: The coolest part of this trip was getting to play Mob Of The Dead on BO2 and getting to say I have been there!!! The golden gate bridge is cool too!

cities.name: Toronto
cities.description: Me begging my mom to let us go up the CN Tower because I was absolutely obsessed with it, and I honestly cannot remeber for the life of me the reason for it.

cities.name: Vancouver
cities.description: After watching the 2010 Olympics it was an honest dream come true to have travelled to the host city!!! Most memorable moment was getting to shoot the olympic guns at the olympic course.

cities.name: Vatican City
cities.description: Went twice, first time was enough but my cousin Gabby dragged me there for a second time! All good, got my revenge on here in Connect 4.

cities.name: Venice
cities.description: Honestly one of the most beautiful cities in the world filled with so much history, but wow does it need some Febreeze!!!

cities.name: Victoria
cities.description: It's a picture of my sister Victoria because she wouldn't stop talking about how the city was named after her....

cities.name: Duntroon
cities.description: Weekend trip to the small unknown town in order to run the Spartan Race with some of my best friends!!!

cities.name: Sutton
cities.description: Trip to my friends summer house with amazing skiing, hikes and water!!!

cities.name: Toulon
cities.description: End of first trip in France where we ended the trip at the beach!!

cities.name: Gruyères Castle
cities.description: The Cheese factory where we learnt about Cherry the cow and got to taste some of the best cheese!!! Then went to the Castle with the best chocolate beer!

cities.name: Montreux
cities.description: Mini stop while in Geneva going around the lake!!!

cities.name: Gaspé
cities.description: Day trip on the road trip where we went to visit Perce rock and the bird island.

cities.name: Petite-Vallée
cities.description: Week long trip to visit the nothern Gaspesian region of Quebec.
